mapper.select: SELECT TELLER_ID as tellerId, TELLER_PWD as tellerPwd, TELLER_NAME as tellerdName, BRANCH_ID as branchId from teller WHERE TELLER_ID = #{tellerId} AND TELLER_PWD = #{tellerPwd}
mapper.insert: insert into USERS(USERS_ID, USERS_PWD, USERS_NAME, USERS_SSN, USERS_SEX, USERS_PHONE, USERS_BIRTH, USERS_ADDRESS) values(#{id}, #{pwd}, #{name}, #{ssn}, #{sex}, #{phone}, #{birth}, #{address})
mapper.update: update USERS set USERS_NAME = #{name}, USERS_PWD = #{pwd}, USERS_SSN = #{ssn}, USERS_SEX = #{sex}, USERS_PHONE = #{phone}, USERS_ADDRESS = #{address} where USERS_ID = #{id}
